attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lot of perfume makes people genuinely ill, allergic, nauseated. It can make sufferers agoraphobic.  You know this if you have ever been stuck in a room with an  otherwise charming person you cannot listen to for feeling nauseated. Perfumes stinks.Please ban, or at least control the use of, heavy stinking perfume?
